briefdescription.para: No repeat.
Repeat the current track (again and again and... ).
Play through all tracks and then do it again.

The current core responsible for playback. This object is the wrapper around the actual playback engine. All calls to the playback engine go through this wrapper. This may be only one of several available playback cores, but it is the current core controlling playback.
The volume. The volume as reported by the core, or set upon the core.
The mute state. The mute state as reported by the core, or set upon the core.
The position within the current track. The number of milliseconds from the start of the current track as reported by or set upon the core.

detaileddescription.para: /brief The length of the current track. Reported by the core.

/brief The pause state of the core. If paused, playback will continue from the current position.
playing

briefdescription.para: The playing state of the core. Seperate from pause state. A paused track is playing, a stopped track is not playing AND not paused. A.
Repeat state. This has 3 possible states the are reflected in the constants.

simplesect.para: REPEAT_MODE_NONE

briefdescription.para: Shuffle state.
Number of items in the current playlist. As reported by the current view.
The Index for the current track in the playback core.

simplesect.para: The index, or -1 if not playing

briefdescription.para: The GUID for the current track in the playback core.

simplesect.para: The GUID, or blank if not playing

briefdescription.para: The URL for the current track in the playback core.

simplesect.para: The URL, or blank if not playing

briefdescription.para: Has playback started. This is mainly used internally. This does not check the state of the player.

detaileddescription.para: Does this really need to be exposed through an interface?

briefdescription.para: What view is being played.
Add a playback core. Add a playback core to the collection of cores available for media playback. If the core already exists it doesn't get added again but will be selected if aSelect is true.

parameterdescription.para: - The Core wrapper that interfaces with the core implementation
- A boolean to indicate if the core should be selected as the current playback core.

simplesect.para: void

briefdescription.para: Take a core out of the collection of available playback cores.

parameterdescription.para: - the core to remove

simplesect.para: void

briefdescription.para: Select the core passed in as the current core. If the core passed in doesn't already exist in the collection it gets added first. Then it is selected as the current playback core.

parameterdescription.para: - the core to add.

simplesect.para: void

briefdescription.para: Begin playback. If previously paused playback will start at the same position. If stopped playback will begin at the beginning of the track. Paused playback will start from the same point.

parameterdescription.para: if no core has been set.

simplesect.para: true

briefdescription.para: Halt playback This maintains the position in the track and halts the playback.

parameterdescription.para: if no core has been set.

simplesect.para: true

briefdescription.para: Halt playback Stops the playback of the current track. Restarting the playback after this call casuses it to start from the beginning of the track.

parameterdescription.para: if no core has been set.

simplesect.para: true

briefdescription.para: Advance playback to the next track.

parameterdescription.para: if no core has been set.

simplesect.para: the index of the currently playing track

briefdescription.para: Set playback to the track before the current one in play order.

parameterdescription.para: if no core has been set.

simplesect.para: the index of the currently playing track

briefdescription.para: Get the index of the current track.

parameterdescription.para: if no core has been set.

simplesect.para: the index of the currently playing track

briefdescription.para: Make the playback take the full screen. This only makes sense for video playback.

parameterdescription.para: if no core has been set.

simplesect.para: true

briefdescription.para: Play a piece of media directly via URL.

parameterdescription.para: - the URL of the media to play.
if the core has not been set.

simplesect.para: true if playback is successfull
false if playback was not successful

briefdescription.para: Play a media list view.

parameterdescription.para: The media list view to play.
The index of the track to play within the view.

simplesect.para: Status of success of playback from the media list view.

parameterdescription.para: Playback from media list view succeeded.
Playback from the media list view failed.

briefdescription.para: Return metadata metadata. Return the number of fields supported and their identifiers.

listitem.para: implement getMetadataFields, currently sets out params to 0 and ""

parameterdescription.para: - the number of metadata fields supported
- An array of metadata identifiers.
if the core has not been set.

simplesect.para: void

briefdescription.para: Give the value of the metadata field specified.

simplesect.para: the value of the metadata

briefdescription.para: Set the value of the metadata specified.

- the value to set the metadata to.

- The values of the metadata to set.

briefdescription.para: Check to see if an url points to media content This checks for a number of known file extensions and prefixes to see if the URL contains them and is therefore media.

parameterdescription.para: - the URL to check

simplesect.para: true if the URL points to media content
false if the URL does not point to media content

briefdescription.para: Check to see if an url points to video content This checks for a number of known file extensions to see if the URL contains them and is therefore video.

parameterdescription.para: - the URL to check

simplesect.para: true if the URL points to video content
false if the URL does not point to video content

briefdescription.para: Check to see if an url points to a playlist This checks for a number of known file extensions to see if the URL contains them and is therefore a playlist.

parameterdescription.para: - the URL to check

simplesect.para: true if the URL points to a playlist
false if the URL does not point a playlist

briefdescription.para: Return an enumeration of the file extensions that are supported for playback.

simplesect.para: an nsIStringEnumerator containting the list of extensions

briefdescription.para: Removes the hours from the string passed in.

parameterdescription.para: - a string in the format HH:MM:SS

simplesect.para: - The string with the HH:

briefdescription.para: Convert an integer into a time duration.

parameterdescription.para: - an integer representing the number of seconds

simplesect.para: A time string in the format HH:MM:SS
"Error" if hours is greater than 50

briefdescription.para: Un-Escape a URL and find the leaf name.

parameterdescription.para: - the URL to convert

simplesect.para: The URL passed in if it does not decode properly

briefdescription.para: Unescape a URL and find the "basename".

simplesect.para: The URL passed in if it does not decode properly
The text before the last '\' or '//' in the URL

briefdescription.para: Defines standard media player playback functionality. This interface defines the interface for managing playback cores (adding selecting and removing) and for controlling the playback of media in the cores (play, stop, pause, etc). Objects wishing to control playback should get an instance of this class via Components.Classes() and call these methods on that object.

simplesect.para: sbICoreWrapper An interface that describes the PlaylistPlayback Service
